Name: Chicken Tikka
Short description: Succulent chicken pieces marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled to perfection
Description: Traditional Indian appetizer featuring tender chicken pieces marinated in aromatic spices and yogurt, then grilled in tandoor style. A perfect start to your meal.

Name: Chilli Chicken Dry
Short description: Indo-Chinese style crispy chicken tossed with peppers and chillis in spicy sauce
Description: Popular Indo-Chinese dish with crispy fried chicken pieces tossed with bell peppers, onions, and green chillis in a spicy tangy sauce.

Name: Tandoori Chicken (On the bone)
Short description: Classic tandoori chicken on the bone, marinated in traditional spices
Description: Authentic tandoori chicken prepared with bone-in pieces, marinated overnight in yogurt and traditional Indian spices, then cooked in tandoor for that signature smoky flavor.

Name: Butter Chicken
Short description: Tender chicken in rich, creamy tomato-based gravy
Description: Classic North Indian curry featuring succulent chicken pieces in a velvety tomato and butter sauce with cream and aromatic spices.

Name: Chicken Tikka Masala
Short description: Grilled chicken tikka in spiced tomato cream sauce
Description: Marinated chicken tikka pieces cooked in a rich, spiced tomato and cream based masala sauce. A British-Indian favorite.

Name: Chicken Do Pyaza
Short description: Chicken curry with double the onions for extra flavor
Description: Tender chicken pieces slow-cooked with caramelized onions in two styles - creating layers of sweet, savory depth in a luscious, aromatic gravy. A traditional favorite that gets richer with every bite.

Name: Kadhai Chicken
Short description: Chicken cooked with bell peppers and tomatoes in kadhai spices
Description: Juicy chicken pieces wok-tossed with vibrant bell peppers, tomatoes, and onions in a bold, freshly ground spice blend. Each bite bursts with robust flavors and a delightful char.

Name: Hariyali Chicken
Short description: Green chicken curry with coriander, mint and spinach
Description: Vibrant green curry made with fresh coriander, mint, spinach and green chillis, giving the chicken a unique herbaceous flavor.

Name: Chicken Curry
Short description: Traditional home-style chicken curry
Description: Classic Indian chicken curry prepared with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of traditional spices. Comfort food at its best.

Name: Chicken Changezi
Short description: Rich Mughlai-style chicken curry with creamy gravy
Description: Royal Mughlai curry with chicken cooked in a rich, creamy gravy flavored with aromatic spices, cream and cashew paste.

Name: Chicken Manchurian
Short description: Indo-Chinese chicken in tangy soy-based sauce
Description: Popular Indo-Chinese dish with chicken dumplings or pieces in a tangy, slightly sweet sauce with soy, ginger and garlic.

Name: Egg Curry
Short description: Boiled eggs in spiced onion-tomato gravy
Description: Perfectly cooked eggs nestled in a silky, spiced tomato-onion gravy enriched with warming spices. A comforting, protein-packed curry that's both homey and indulgent.

Name: Chicken Dum Biryani w/ Raita
Short description: Aromatic basmati rice layered with spiced chicken, slow-cooked
Description: Traditional dum-cooked biryani with fragrant basmati rice layered with marinated chicken, herbs and spices, served with cooling raita.

Name: Butter Chicken Biryani w/ Raita
Short description: Fusion biryani combining butter chicken flavors with rice
Description: Innovative biryani featuring butter chicken flavored rice with tender chicken pieces, combining two favorites into one dish. Served with raita.

Name: Egg Fried Rice
Short description: Indo-Chinese style fried rice with scrambled eggs
Description: Wok-fired rice with fluffy scrambled eggs, crisp vegetables, and savory soy - each grain perfectly seasoned and slightly smoky from the high heat. Addictively good.

Name: Egg Chicken Kathi Roll
Short description: Chicken tikka wrapped in egg-coated paratha with chutney
Description: Popular Indian street food with chicken tikka and egg wrapped in a flaky paratha with onions, peppers and tangy chutney.

Name: Chicken Kathi Roll
Short description: Chicken tikka wrapped in paratha with chutney and vegetables
Description: Classic kathi roll with spiced chicken tikka wrapped in soft paratha with onions, peppers and flavorful chutney.

Name: Egg Roll
Short description: Scrambled egg wrapped in paratha with vegetables and chutney
Description: Fluffy spiced scrambled eggs with caramelized onions and peppers, wrapped in a warm, buttery paratha and drizzled with tangy chutney. Street food perfection in every bite.

Name: Paneer Tikka
Short description: Cottage cheese cubes marinated and grilled with peppers
Description: Succulent cubes of cottage cheese marinated in aromatic spiced yogurt, char-grilled to smoky perfection with caramelized peppers and onions. Crispy edges, creamy center - irresistibly addictive.

Name: Chilli Paneer Dry
Short description: Indo-Chinese crispy paneer tossed in spicy chilli sauce
Description: Popular Indo-Chinese appetizer with crispy paneer cubes tossed with peppers, onions and green chillis in spicy sauce.

Name: Gobhi Manchurian Dry
Short description: Crispy cauliflower florets in Indo-Chinese Manchurian sauce
Description: Crispy battered cauliflower florets tossed in tangy, spicy Manchurian sauce with ginger, garlic and soy.

Name: Paneer Tikka Masala
Short description: Grilled paneer in spiced tomato cream sauce
Description: Marinated paneer tikka pieces in a rich, spiced tomato and cream based masala sauce.
Meta: dietary_info: Contains: Dairy, May contain nuts, Vegetarian

Name: Chilli Paneer Gravy
Short description: Paneer in Indo-Chinese style spicy gravy
Description: Tender paneer cubes bathed in a fiery, tangy Indo-Chinese sauce with crunchy peppers and onions. The perfect balance of heat, sweet, and savory that'll have you reaching for more.

Name: Mushroom Chilli
Short description: Mushrooms in spicy Indo-Chinese chilli sauce
Description: Meaty mushrooms tossed in a bold, spicy Indo-Chinese sauce with crisp peppers and aromatic ginger-garlic. Each bite packs a punch of umami, heat, and satisfying texture.

Name: Paneer Ke Kofte
Short description: Paneer dumplings in creamy curry sauce
Description: Soft paneer and potato dumplings (koftas) served in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy.
Meta: dietary_info: Contains: Dairy, May contain nuts, Vegetarian

Name: Pasanda Paneer
Short description: Rich Mughlai-style paneer curry with creamy gravy
Description: Royal Mughlai curry with paneer slices in a rich, creamy gravy flavored with aromatic spices and nuts.

Name: Matar Paneer
Short description: Paneer and peas in tomato-onion gravy
Description: Soft paneer cubes and sweet green peas swimming in a luscious tomato-onion gravy, subtly spiced and utterly comforting. A timeless North Indian classic that never disappoints.

Name: Mix Vegetable
Short description: Mixed vegetables in spiced curry sauce
Description: A vibrant medley of garden-fresh seasonal vegetables simmered in aromatic spices and a silky curry sauce. Wholesome, colorful, and bursting with natural flavors.

Name: Dum Aloo
Short description: Baby potatoes in rich Kashmiri-style gravy
Description: Baby potatoes cooked in a rich, aromatic Kashmiri-style gravy with yogurt and spices.
Meta: allergens: Dairy (yogurt, may contain cream), Cashews (may contain)
Meta: dietary_info: Contains: Dairy, May contain nuts, Vegetarian

Name: Yellow Daal Tadka
Short description: Yellow lentils tempered with cumin and garlic
Description: Comfort food - yellow lentils (moong/toor dal) cooked to perfection and tempered with ghee, cumin, garlic and spices.

Name: Gobhi Stuffed Paratha
Short description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced cauliflower
Description: Flaky whole wheat paratha generously stuffed with spiced, grated cauliflower - golden-crisp on the outside, soft and flavorful inside. Served with cooling raita or zesty green chutney.

Name: Aloo Stuffed Paratha
Short description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced potatoes
Description: Classic Indian flatbread stuffed with seasoned mashed potatoes. Perfect breakfast or meal. Served with green chutney or raita.

Name: Paneer Stuffed Paratha
Short description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced cottage cheese
Description: Buttery paratha filled with fragrant, spiced cottage cheese and fresh herbs - each bite a perfect blend of crispy, flaky layers and creamy, savory filling. Served with cooling raita or zesty green chutney.

Name: Cheese and Onion Stuffed Paratha
Short description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with cheese and onions
Description: Fusion paratha stuffed with cheese and onions for a delicious savory breakfast. Served with green chutney or raita.

Name: Aloo Matar with 8 Kachoris
Short description: 8 crispy kachoris served with potato and pea curry
Description: Popular North Indian combo - 8 crispy, flaky kachoris (deep-fried pastries) served with spiced potato and pea curry (aloo matar).

Name: Chilli Paneer with Veg Noodles
Short description: Chilli paneer served with stir-fried vegetable noodles
Description: Indo-Chinese combo featuring spicy chilli paneer with stir-fried vegetable noodles.
Meta: dietary_info: Contains: Dairy, Gluten, Soy, Spicy, Vegetarian

Name: Paneer Kathi Roll
Short description: Paneer tikka wrapped in paratha with chutney
Description: Paneer tikka pieces wrapped in soft paratha with onions, peppers and tangy chutney. Classic street food.

Name: Veg Biryani w/ Raita (1000ml Box)
Short description: Aromatic basmati rice with mixed vegetables, served with raita
Description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with mixed vegetables, herbs and aromatic spices, slow-cooked to perfection. Served with raita.

Name: Veg Noodles
Short description: Stir-fried noodles with mixed vegetables
Description: Silky hakka noodles wok-tossed with crisp, colorful vegetables in savory sauces and aromatic seasonings. Slightly charred, perfectly springy - street food heaven in every slurp.

Name: Veg Fried Rice
Short description: Indo-Chinese style fried rice with vegetables
Description: Perfectly wok-charred rice studded with colorful crisp vegetables, kissed with savory soy and aromatic spices. Each grain separate, flavorful, and slightly smoky - pure Indo-Chinese comfort.

Name: Phulka Roti (3 pcs)
Short description: 3 soft whole wheat Indian flatbreads
Description: Warm, pillowy whole wheat flatbreads puffed to perfection over an open flame - soft, slightly charred, and wonderfully aromatic. The essential accompaniment to any curry.
